{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
from scattertext.WhitespaceNLP import whitespace_nlp_with_sentences, whitespace_nlp, Tok, Doc
import scattertext as st

nlp=whitespace_nlp_with_sentences

df['parse'] = df['text'].apply(st.whitespace_nlp_with_sentences)
df["label"] = df["label"].map(lambda x: str(x) )
corpus = st.CorpusFromParsedDocuments(
    df, 
    category_col='label', 
    parsed_col='parse', 
    feats_from_spacy_doc=st.PyTextRankPhrases()).build().get_unigram_corpus().compact(st.AssociationCompactor(2000))



html = st.produce_scattertext_explorer(
    corpus,
    category="1", category_name='ProblemStatement', not_category_name='Other',
    minimum_term_frequency=0, pmi_threshold_coefficient=0,
    width_in_pixels=1000, 
    #metadata=corpus.get_df()['speaker'],
    transform=st.Scalers.dense_rank
)
open('./demo_compact.html', 'w').write(html)
